topics.body:
I've been getting back into Skyrim recently, and I noticed something in it I've never seen in the game before.

!http://www.ladymoiraine.com/forum/gallery/19/2135_18_11_11_2_48_08_19082397.jpeg!

Fucking ants! Not as a static texture or anything but actual little ants moving around in the game world. Its one of those little details that makes the game cool.
